name: bonk! (Keegan77)
description:
(NOTE: VERY EARLY ACCESS. THERE AREN'T EVEN SOUNDS YET)

Bonk! is a 2D platform fighting game where you must jump on your opponent's head to win! Either be the one bonking... or get bonked.
That's it. That's the game.

CONTROLS:
Player 1:  WASD
Jump: Space
Firepower: F
______________________________________________________
Player 2: Arrow Keys
Jump: K
Firepower: L

CREDITS:
Programming - Keegan & Darren
Assets: Keegan
